channel.title: #474 Arthion server released GODSWORDS PKING SPECS 100%
channel.description:
I've gone sick and tired of this server. Sorry all. This server just didn't feel right. I may start a new server but I don't know how to write a stable server without looking at rs2hd if anybody would like to tutor me add me [email]Vigan-k@hotmail.co.uk[/email] or [email]Vigan20@live.com[/email].
THIS IS MY SPAWN SERVER BY THE WAY, IT DOESN'T HAVE ALL THE FEATURES I LISTED, LIKE NPC COMBAT OR MAGIC BASE.
Thanks.
[CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/xcuexz.png[/img][/FONT]
[COLOR="RED"]31 :: May :: 2010[/color]
- All wilderness levels complete. - all wilderness multi-way combat zones complete. - Skulling system complete. - Almost perfected combat completely - Barrelchest anchor with special attack
[COLOR="RED"]22 :: May :: 2010[/color]
- Poisoning re-added - Starting location for spawn server set - Special attacks whilst dead - Blue hit marks on granite maul special attack (for hits higher than 0.) - Eating while dropping dead
[COLOR="RED"]21 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]
- Ranged complete again. - Hit delays are perfect, they vary on distance length and projectile speed. - Magic shortbow now has a special attack. - Combat fully complete (finally!) - Combat specials complete ^^ - Combat sound effects complete - Combo hitting complete - Loads of updates, just forgot to log them.
[COLOR="RED"]15 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]
- All Lumbridge doors, stairs and ladders fully operable - NPC following clipping added
[COLOR="RED"]14 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]
- Regular spellbook autocasts complete - Magic skill complete
[COLOR="Red"]13 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]
- Magic base set-up - All regular-spell teleports added - Wielding an item doesn't make the old item appear in first slot anymore - Autocasting base.
[COLOR="Red"]12 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]
- NPCs now spawn again once dead - Some NPC sizes configured. - NPC attacking distance fixed - NPC health bar fixed (was always showing 1/10 bar even if it was full hp) - NPC drop controllers - Added new 'Total kill' amount for players, saves too. - Added total deaths. - Special attack bonuses fixed again. - Players and NPCs both 'cool down' now, for single/multi area purposes like pjing in wildy or attacking other people's monsters - Death animations fixed perfectly, with proper use of delay (npcupdate) [/center]
[SPOILER="Pictures"] [CENTER] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/608412/bca.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/581665/ss.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/580251/ranged2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/570718/object.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/569744/mage.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/569407/autocasting.png[/img] [img]http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/8231/ranged.png[/img] [IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/9927/37880107.png[/img] [IMG]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/8118/telej.png[/img] [img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/8696/gloryu.png[/img] [IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/5316/cookingready.png[/img] [IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/884/prayerq.png[/img] [IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/3424/prayer2l.png[/img] [img]http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/9379/duelz.png[/img] [IMG]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/2228/shopsui.png[/img] [IMG]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/201/46587671.png[/img] [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/1601/iod.png[/img] [FONT=Palatino Linotype][IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/6018/arthionshops.png[/img][/FONT] [FONT=Palatino Linotype][IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/3999/banking.png[/img][/FONT] [FONT=Palatino Linotype][IMG]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/3488/cluescrolls.png[/img][/FONT] [IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/1206/dialogue.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[img]http://www.javacoolsoftware.com/images/download/download_arrow.png[/img]
- Pre-download -
[url=http://www.upload.ee/files/610873/Arthion_v1.6.rar.html]UPLOAD.EE - Download Arthion_v1.6.rar[/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/610873/Arthion_v1.6.rar.html]UPLOAD.EE - Download Arthion_v1.6.rar[/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/610873/Arthion_v1.6.rar.html]UPLOAD.EE - Download Arthion_v1.6.rar[/url]
Server link: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=B3D6TQRS]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=B3D6TQRS[/url]
[CODE]474 cache: [url]http://rapidshare.com/files/212576295/474cache.zip[/url] <-- Cache [url]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DEQKGHP2[/url]
Instructions: place this cache in C:/ so it will look like; C:/cache474/.jagex etc [/CODE]
[CODE]474 client: Update server client: [url]http://rapidshare.com/files/213410091/Implented_UpdateServer.rar[/url] - You do not need an update server in your server to run this. normal client: [url]http://rapidshare.com/files/212572950/474_compressed_maps.rar[/url] - You require an update server (built in with v474) to run this.[/CODE]
[/center]

item.dc:creator: @Vigan Vigan
item.description:
@Vigan wrote:

I’ve gone sick and tired of this server. Sorry all. This server just didn’t feel right. I may start a new server but I don’t know how to write a stable server without looking at rs2hd if anybody would like to tutor me add me Vigan-k@hotmail.co.uk or Vigan20@live.com.

THIS IS MY SPAWN SERVER BY THE WAY, IT DOESN’T HAVE ALL THE FEATURES I LISTED, LIKE NPC COMBAT OR MAGIC BASE.

Thanks.

[CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype]

xcuexz.png750×250
[/FONT]

[COLOR=“RED”]31 :: May :: 2010[/color]

  • All wilderness levels complete.
  • all wilderness multi-way combat zones complete.
  • Skulling system complete.
  • Almost perfected combat completely
  • Barrelchest anchor with special attack

[COLOR=“RED”]22 :: May :: 2010[/color]

  • Poisoning re-added
  • Starting location for spawn server set
  • Special attacks whilst dead
  • Blue hit marks on granite maul special attack (for hits higher than 0.)
  • Eating while dropping dead

[COLOR=“RED”]21 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]

  • Ranged complete again.
  • Hit delays are perfect, they vary on distance length and projectile speed.
  • Magic shortbow now has a special attack.
  • Combat fully complete (finally!)
  • Combat specials complete ^^
  • Combat sound effects complete
  • Combo hitting complete
  • Loads of updates, just forgot to log them.

[COLOR=“RED”]15 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]

  • All Lumbridge doors, stairs and ladders fully operable
  • NPC following clipping added

[COLOR=“RED”]14 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]

  • Regular spellbook autocasts complete
  • Magic skill complete

[COLOR=“Red”]13 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]

  • Magic base set-up
  • All regular-spell teleports added
  • Wielding an item doesn’t make the old item appear in first slot anymore
  • Autocasting base.

[COLOR=“Red”]12 :: May :: 2010[/COLOR]

  • NPCs now spawn again once dead
  • Some NPC sizes configured.
  • NPC attacking distance fixed
  • NPC health bar fixed (was always showing 1/10 bar even if it was full hp)
  • NPC drop controllers
  • Added new ‘Total kill’ amount for players, saves too.
  • Added total deaths.
  • Special attack bonuses fixed again.
  • Players and NPCs both ‘cool down’ now, for single/multi area purposes like pjing in wildy or attacking other people’s monsters
  • Death animations fixed perfectly, with proper use of delay (npcupdate)
    [/center]
